name: Strip Fighter
description: Even if the title may get you confused, this game is completely unrelated to Turbografx's Strip Fighter II (which by the way, doesn't have any predecessor). Strip Fighter is a later game in which you will not exactly "fight", but just play strip poker. For this, you can choose opponents from a wide range of digitalized girls (18, more concretely) from a lot of different countries and spanning all continents. Regarding game rules, they are simple: the better you play, the less clothes your rivals will have on and the worse you play the more probabilities you will have to get a cold.

shot.caption: Select your Strip Fighter Part II
